amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike all provisions related to youth.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered one printed in House Report 109-11 to strike all provisions related to youth.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 222 (Roll no. 44).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Kildee.
